title: tokyohd
author: tokyohd
content: Shares of Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) started trading at a massive discount of roughly 35%, according to data provided by YCharts. This came after the U.S. Securities and Exchange rejected the company’s application to convert the trust into an exchange-traded fund despite months of extreme lobbying.  The formidable securities regulator raised concerns over market manipulation, echoing its previous rejections.     Grayscale followed through on its threat to sue the SEC if its ETF filing gets shot down by the regulator. It took the federal agency to court immediately after the unfavorable verdict. More Info: https://u.today/grayscales-bitcoin-fund-reaches-record-discount-after-sec-snub
